Computer.encryptedFile:
############################################################# ## TOP SECRET: Stuxnet v2.0 ## ## --GOVERNMENT ATTACK PLANS-- ## #############################################################
Okay, so I've finally got hold of the original Stuxnet virus and I move to weaponize the code again. It's time for this virus to be used for something even better. For some time now I have been angry for the government, for a great many reasons. For one, I lost my Father to the government and they didn't even care. Just another 'casualty of war.' I cannot stand it any longer! It is time they pay for what they have done. I have finally created the perfect virus!
Only one thing stands in my way! That is some of the world's top hackers. - 'T4lisman' - '#PLAYERNAME#' - 'r00t'
but it looks like they want to get themselves into Hacker Wars, maybe I could help them out. That might get them off my back. At least long enough so that I can set #PLAYERNAME# up, make it look like they did it. It would be most believable considering how talented they are.
I've collated all my stuxnet raw code below: #BINARY#
- Lazarus Z.
